Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to prohibit the sale of single use plastic and polystyrene foam in state parks
Summary: Requires the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to prohibit the sale of single use plastic and polystyrene foam in state parks.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง3.09, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to prohibit the sale of single use plastic and polystyrene foam in state parks
